Pre-Game Insights: England's last assignment in the shortest format was way back in December 2023 when they toured the West Indies. They lost the series by a 3-2 margin.
Jofra Archer will return to the squad after a long layoff due to an injury.
Pakistan faced Ireland in a three-match T20I series before heading to England. They won the next two games to clinch the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There have been 29 meetings between England and Pakistan in the shortest format. England have won 19 of those whereas Pakistan have won nine, with one ending in no-result.
Others: The pitch at Headingley offers a good amount of assistance to the pacers. They will get some lateral movement with the new ball. Adapting to the conditions will be the key for the batters.
There won't be ideal conditions on offer for a game of cricket in Leeds. There is a high chance of rain predicted on Wednesday, with the temperature expected to be under 15 degrees Celsius.
